The Professional plan ($41/month) includes 5 bots and all channels (WhatsApp, Web, Telegram, Slack, Facebook Messenger) .Starter ($17/month) limits to 3 bots and excludes WhatsApp. We offer discounts , please visit our 'Pricing' section to know more about it.
